Method Detail

getValue

@Deprecated
public int getValue()
Deprecated. 

Returns getValueHigh()/4, for Handy-Board backwards compatabilty. This method is deprecated. You should be using getValueHigh which corrisponds to the userlib analog10 function.

Specified by:
getValue in interface IAnalogSensor

getValueHigh

public int getValueHigh()
This is the function you want!

Specified by:
getValueHigh in interface IAnalogSensor

setFloating

public void setFloating(boolean floating)
Enables or disables sensor floating mode, required for ET sensor.

Parameters:
floating - true turns on floating mode, false turns it off

updateFloatingPorts

protected void updateFloatingPorts()
Updates the floating point ports with the floatingSensors array. It must be done this way due to the userlib api design
